mapper.select: SELECT c.id_customer as idCustomer, c.name_customer as nameCustomer, c.phone_number_customer as phoneNumberCustomer, c.address_customer as addressCustomer, e.name_employees as nameEmployees FROM customers c JOIN employees e on e.id_employees = c.id_employees WHERE c.status_delete = 0 AND TRIM(name_customer) LIKE CONCAT(#{nameCustomer}, '%') AND TRIM(phone_number_customer) LIKE CONCAT(#{phoneNumberCustomer}, '%') ORDER BY c.name_customer LIMIT #{pageIndex} OFFSET #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM customers c JOIN employees e on c.id_employees = e.id_employees WHERE c.status_delete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE customers c SET c.status_delete = 1 WHERE c.id_customer = #{idCustomer}
